mapper.sql: l.id, l.public_id, l.project_id, l.member_id, u.user_name as member_name, u.image as member_img, l.content, l.log_type, l.create_time
mapper.select:
select
from prm_log l left join tb_user u on l.member_id = u.user_id where id = #{id}

select l.id, l.public_id, l.project_id, l.member_id, u.user_name as member_name, u.image as member_img, l.content, l.log_type, l.create_time from prm_log l left join tb_user u on l.member_id = u.user_id where public_id = #{publicId} order by create_time desc limit 0,10

select
from prm_log where project_id = #{projectId} and log_type = 0

select
from prm_log where public_id = #{publicId} and log_type = 1 order by create_time

select id,public_id as publicId,project_id as projectId,member_id as memberId,content,log_type as logType,l.create_time as createTime,image as memberImg from prm_log l left join tb_user u on u.user_id = l.member_id where public_id = #{publicId} order by l.create_time desc limit 10,#{surpluscount}

SELECT l.member_id as memberId, u.image as memberImg, l.content, l.create_time as createTime, l.project_id, p.project_name as projectName, l.public_id, t.task_id as taskId, t.task_name as taskName, t.task_group_id as groupId FROM prm_log l JOIN tb_user u JOIN prm_task t JOIN prm_project p ON l.member_id = u.user_id AND l.public_id = t.task_id AND l.project_id = p.project_id WHERE l.log_flag = 1 AND l.member_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.create_time DESC
